body.name: Fashion Fidgets Dolls – Sensory Toy Doll for Kids Anxiety and Stress Relief – Fidget Toy (2023 Edition)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 29 mins
features: NEW FIDGET DOLLS IN A RAINBOW OF COLORS! Fidget in all the colors of the rainbow with Fashion Fidgets Series 2. Each doll is styled in one color from head to toe.

10+ WAYS TO FIDGET IN STYLE: Each Fashion Fidgets Series 2 doll comes with 10 ways to fidget from their cheeks to their hair to their fashions. Click, pop, spin and style your dolls in so many ways. Will you find all new fidget features like pop tube hair or monkey noodle pigtails?
MIX AND MATCH SKIRTS: Each doll includes a poppin’ removable skirt that you can mix and match as you collect. The skirt also becomes a popper fidget on its own.

CREATED WITH MRS.BENCH! Each Fashion Fidgets doll was created in partnership with fidget queen, Mrs. Bench! Fashion Fidgets combine the stress release & focusing benefits of fidget toys and sensory play with the imaginative pretend play of a doll! It’s a sensory experience from unboxing to play time!

COLLECT AND TRADE! Collect all 12 gorgeous Fashion Fidgets Series 2 dolls. Grow your Fashion Fidgets collection by trading with friends! Collect based on your favorite colors or based on your favorite fidget feature. Fun for every fashionista ages 5+.
TAKE THEM EVERYWHERE! Each doll includes a removable keychain, so you can bring your Fashion Fidgets with you everywhere! Attach them to your backpack so they go wherever you go.
body.description: Fidget with all the colors of the rainbow with Fashion Fidgets Series 2, beautiful, collectible dolls with over 10 ways to fidget in style, created with fidget queen, Mrs. Bench. Each all-new doll is styled in one color from head to toe with poppin’ removable skirts that you can mix and match. You can even use the skirt as a popper fidget on its own. Find all new fidget hairstyles like pop tube ponytails and extra-stretchy monkey noodle pigtails. Each set includes a trading board, so you can trade based on your favorite colors or your favorite fidget features. Each doll comes with a keychain to attach to your backpack, so you can take them on the go! Collect 12 dolls with Fashion Fidgets Series 2! Fashion Fidgets combine the stress release benefits of fidget toys and sensory play, with the imaginative play dolls! Fun for every fashionista ages 5+.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was going to be a gift, but the boxes were so severely damaged, I had to remove the dolls from the box and put them into a gift box. Overall cute! But if you are planning to gift these, you might need to put them in a separate gift bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Daughter loved this cute little surprise fidget doll!! Great stocking stuffer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kid not interested
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a 6-year-old but she was not at all interested in the one that she got. I didn't realize that there was a possibility of getting one that did not have some sort of pop it on it. The one she got had some buttons and spinny things which did not interest her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thiught these would make the perfect stocking stuffers. My kids have been wanting them for a while now, and they seem very fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I think I missed something….
reviews.reviewText: So if you’re like me, you buy based off the image you’re shown. In this case I thought I bought my daughter the girl with the bubble braid. I did not read the description so that is on me. This is for a MYSTERY toy. We ended up getting the worst one that just pops/clicks loudly (it’s extremely annoying). I wouldn’t purchase this again- straight to the trash it went. 3 stars because I think the seller should have the actual picture of what you are getting exactly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as stated and perfect condition. Bought for a road trip package I’m creating for my daughter. Exactly as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 8 yr old niece for Christmas she loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Bad packaging - do not order if you want as a gift
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t been able to get inside the box and see the quality of the fidget. No doubt it’s overpriced plastic rubbish.However, my daughter really wanted this for her birthday which is why I ordered it.The parcel came and the thin cardboard box was crushed. Really not presentable for a gift. For the cost of the toy, do better with your packaging.
